original_text: People told the ruler, Herod, about all the things that were happening. His mind was confused because people were saying lots of different things about Jesus. Some people were saying, ‘John the Baptist died but now he has become alive again.’
korean_text: 분봉 왕 헤롯이 이 모든 일을 듣고 심히 당황하니 이는 어떤 사람은 요한이 죽은 자 가운데서 살아났다고도 하며

sentences.original_text: about all the things that were happening
because people were saying lots of different things
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 사람들이 많은 다른 것들을 말하고 있었기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: but now he has become alive again
